doc.name: MirrorComposite
doc.description: A composite that contains one actor and mirrors the ports and parameters of that actor. This is identical to the base class except that it requires its ports to be of type MirrorPort or ParameterMirrorPort. That is, every port of this composite is mirrored in the inside model, whereas the base class tolerates ports that are not mirrored (typically instances of TypedIOPort).
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya, Edward A. Lee
